data.text:
Tarifa

19 km away

Escuela Hispalense

1 review

"Everybody who was working in the school of Hispalense was great."

One of the best Spanish language schools in Spain. Hispalense is situated in Tarifa, Southern Spain, and was founded in 1989 as one of the first language schools in Cadiz Province. With our selection of Spanish language courses in Spain, we aim to support and motivate our students, so they can apply what they learn in our classrooms to everyday life in Andalusia. To help us achieve this aim, we have a fantastic group of professional and patient teachers who thrive on making their lessons interesting and fun. At our Spanish language school in Spain, there will always be someone to help you with any queries, helping you to improve your knowledge as quickly and as methodically as possible. There is no better way to learn the Spanish language than a Spanish Course abroad in Spain! We offer Spanish classes in Spain for adults, teenagers and kids, and we strive to give you as much information as possible about the courses and extra activities on offer, before you make your journey out to Tarifa. Here at the Hispalense Spanish Language School, our team of dedicated teachers will support you during the Spanish course with a series of structured lessons that will mix entertainment with theory to make them accessible to all kinds of learner. There is no better way to learn Spanish language than in Spain itself, and even more so here at Hispalense! We offer the following Spanish courses in Spain: Standard Spanish course Intensive Spanish course Preparation Course for the D.E.L.E exam Private Spanish classes Spanish program for foreigners living in Tarifa Spanish Brush-up course For students that already have previous studies in Spanish or a rough knowledge of the language, courses start every monday. For those students who will be studying Spanish for the very first time, courses start every second week. You can find the exact entry dates. The duration of the Spanish courses is individually chosen by each student. There is a minimum duration of ONE WEEK An Interactive Language Program can be organized with local Spanish students practising English or German, giving you the chance to put the theory into practice with a structured exchange of conversation. Information about local events and art exhibits can be found through consultation with our teaching team. Cultural trips are part of the program, with regular visits to Guzman El Bueno Castle, and other sites of cultural interest in the area.

Barbate

43 km away

ACADEMIA BARBATE

Living the Academia Barbate experience is the main formula of our methodology. Our results are more than 95% of our students pass their official tests after preparing with our academy. The secret of the success of our students is that in Academia Barbate we make the lessons attractive, personalized and interesting for the students. In addition to learning the language, they have a fun time and have a great experience to remember, thanks to our complementary activities in which students can practice their language skills having fun with other native students. Academia Barbate is located in Barbate (Costa de la Luz, Andalucía) at the very centre of this fishermen town full of tradition and history, one of the most beautiful landscapes in the province of Cádiz. This excellent location and its wide variety of courses make it ideal for a complete immersion in Spanish language and culture. We offer daily cultural activities including hiking through the national parks, beach sports, flamenco, visits to historical landmarks and popular points of interest in and around the city, Spanish gastronomy and more. The opinions of their satisfied students support our native teachers, both qualified and with years of experience in the sector. As if this were not enough, we also help you find a native family to live with during your stay in Barbate if you wish. For this, or for any other desire, just let us know and we will help you to achieve it.

Vejer de la Frontera

48 km away

Colegio de Español La Janda

7 reviews

"Warm, personal, professional and flexible.... I loved my course at La Janda"

"Really nice, friendly atmosphere in a beautiful Spanish village"

Location Colegio Español La Janda overlooks the historic part of Vejer and is conveniently located between the historic old town and the new. It is undeniably one of the most stunningly beautiful of the famous "pueblos blancos" of Andalusia; and only 10 k¨m away from the awe-inspiring beaches of Costa de La Luz. It has only recently been discovered as a travel destination, which means that it is a town in its own right and the locals tend not to speak English- perfect for a complete immersion experience. Quality and Variety La Janda has gained an excellent reputation and has become the perfect choice for those looking for more than just a Spanish course: we offer a true Spanish experience, in an exceptional natural environment. The school's excellent location and its wide variety of courses make it an ideal location to study Spanish: students can choose a general Intensive course, or combine it with Yoga, Flamenco, Horse riding, Surf courses, all taught in Spanish! Facilities Colegio de Español La Janda has facilities that include free WiFi access, self-study materials, two patios, a scenic roof terrace and a kitchen. The school offers a monthly social and leisure calendar to invite students to practice their Spanish skills while visiting popular points of interest in and around the city.
